channel.title: CommentBB (Free script beta)
channel.description:
[size=10pt]V1.2 RELEASED! - BUGS FIXED - PLEASE REPLY GIVING YOUR FEEDBACK ABOUT COMMENTBB[/size]
I've been working on a script, right now it's going pretty good. I've added in a ACP, Pagination, Register, Login, logout, and a good amount of other features, and this whole script is 100% coded by me and the team members. I'm looking for some CSS, or Graphics makers to join the team. Also some PHP coders.
[u][b]Download latest version:[/b][/u] [url=http://www.commentbb.com/downloads.php]http://www.commentbb.com/downloads.php[/url]
Things that will be added to the "Current features" release after v1.3 is released: (Coming friday)
[ul][*]ALL THE BELOW ITEMS ARE FINISHED [*]Smileys [*]IP Banning [*]Enable or disable guest posting [*]Error messages: "Must be logged in to post" "Must be logged out to login" "Must be logged out to login" "Must be logged in to enter the UCP" [*]Global button navigation added (So you don't have to edit all of your pages to change the buttons!) [*]Post count viewable when visiting someones profile!
[B]Current features:[/B]
[list] [*]Amazing design :) [*]Post count [*]Registering [*]Logging in and out [*]Crown next to an admins name [*]Fully working posting [*]Comment ID's [*]ACP - Verification needed to enter - And people cannot access by visiting the link [*]Post Deleting [*]Editing [*]ID viewer - Type in the message ID to find it quicker [*]Mod CP [*]Must be logged in to post [*]Staff [*]Pagination [*]Profiles [*]Signatures [*]User CP [*]Option to disable posting [*]Banning accounts - Via ACP [*]Unbanning accounts - Via ACP [*]Installing page [*]Security [*]IP Logging [*]Password changing - Via UCP [*]Username changing - Via UCP [*]Set a welcome message for guests via the settings file! [*]News system [*]Member page [*]New design [/list]
[B]Updates to current features:[/B]
[list] [*]Promoting staff without having to add a $name variable, just promote them via ACP. [*]Username and password require a certain amount of characters, if lower then the required amount, you'll get an error message saying something like: "Password must be at least # characters long!" - You can edit it via the settings file. [/list]
[B]Currently working on:[/B]
[list] [*]More security updates [*]More simple updates (Example: "Must be logged in to post") [*]More community features [/list]
[b]Beta/Website:[/b]
[url=http://www.commentbb.com]http://www.commentbb.com[/url]
[size=15pt]Information[/size]
For our script, we want to make it easy to use. So we have one file that pretty much controls everything. And this file contains all the variables and information that is sent out all around the script, containing the information that you have. Examples of this is:
[b]Please note:[/b] [I]All of this information will automatically be written after you have installed the script using the install page.[/I]
[list] [*]The owner's username [*]Database information written to the settings file [*]Auto creation of the owners account [*]And much more! [/list]
[b]Application:[/b][/ul] [code]Position: Experience: Why do you want to join: Name: (Optional) Age: (Must be 11+)[/code]
[b]Team members:[/b]
[IMG]http://commentbb.com/demo/crown_gold.gif[/img] Master (Me) [IMG]http://commentbb.com/demo/crown_gold.gif[/img] Alex

item.title: CommentBB (Free script beta)
item.dc:creator: @akl akl
item.description:
@akl wrote:

Well, considering you claim, then yeah, but I didn’t really bother checking his source code since I wouldn’t change from SMF D:

Read full topic

item.title: CommentBB (Free script beta)
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

akl:

He has put a bit of work in this.

I can see that, but have you looked at the code he’s written? This is good for a beginners learning project but he seems to think people are going to be amazed by this and buy it to use on their sites.

Read full topic

item.title: CommentBB (Free script beta)
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

  1. Where’s showthread.php? It is nowhere to be found in the download.
  2. Properly indent the code, it’s a bitch to read right now
  3. Fix the grammar mistakes.
  4. Make commonly used pieces of code available as an include, like you did with the global_navigation.php file (I’m refering to the “footer” part in pretty much every page)

Too lazy atm to look through it on count of the above things ^

Read full topic

item.title: CommentBB (Free script beta)
item.dc:creator: @kingduffy_1 kingduffy 1
item.description:
@kingduffy_1 wrote:

[size=10pt]V1.2 RELEASED! - BUGS FIXED - PLEASE REPLY GIVING YOUR FEEDBACK ABOUT COMMENTBB[/size]

I’ve been working on a script, right now it’s going pretty good. I’ve added in a ACP, Pagination, Register, Login, logout, and a good amount of other features, and this whole script is 100% coded by me and the team members. I’m looking for some CSS, or Graphics makers to join the team. Also some PHP coders.

Download latest version: http://www.commentbb.com/downloads.php

Things that will be added to the “Current features” release after v1.3 is released: (Coming friday)

[ul][]ALL THE BELOW ITEMS ARE FINISHED
[]Smileys
[]IP Banning
[]Enable or disable guest posting
[]Error messages: “Must be logged in to post” “Must be logged out to login” “Must be logged out to login” “Must be logged in to enter the UCP”
[]Global button navigation added (So you don’t have to edit all of your pages to change the buttons!)
[*]Post count viewable when visiting someones profile!

Current features:

[list]
[]Amazing design
[]Post count
[]Registering
[]Logging in and out
[]Crown next to an admins name
[]Fully working posting
[]Comment ID’s
[]ACP - Verification needed to enter - And people cannot access by visiting the link
[]Post Deleting
[]Editing
[]ID viewer - Type in the message ID to find it quicker
[]Mod CP
[]Must be logged in to post
[]Staff
[]Pagination
[]Profiles
[]Signatures
[]User CP
[]Option to disable posting
[]Banning accounts - Via ACP
[]Unbanning accounts - Via ACP
[]Installing page
[]Security
[]IP Logging
[]Password changing - Via UCP
[]Username changing - Via UCP
[]Set a welcome message for guests via the settings file!
[]News system
[]Member page
[]New design
[/list]

Updates to current features:

[list]
[]Promoting staff without having to add a $name variable, just promote them via ACP.
[]Username and password require a certain amount of characters, if lower then the required amount, you’ll get an error message saying something like: “Password must be at least # characters long!” - You can edit it via the settings file.
[/list]

Currently working on:

[list]
[]More security updates
[]More simple updates (Example: “Must be logged in to post”)
[*]More community features
[/list]

Beta/Website:

http://www.commentbb.com

[size=15pt]Information[/size]

For our script, we want to make it easy to use. So we have one file that pretty much controls everything. And this file contains all the variables and information that is sent out all around the script, containing the information that you have. Examples of this is:

Please note: All of this information will automatically be written after you have installed the script using the install page.

[list]
[]The owner’s username
[]Database information written to the settings file
[]Auto creation of the owners account
[]And much more!
[/list]

Application:[/ul]

Position: Experience: Why do you want to join: Name: (Optional) Age: (Must be 11+)

Team members:

Master (Me)
Alex

Read full topic
